item.title: Go Tests: Creating a session mock for authentication using SCS
item.description: In this article, we'll explore how to mock our session and inject data into context for authentication tests

item.title: How to hash class names in Astro using astro-rename integration
item.description: Learn how to use the astro-rename integration to hash all CSS class names from your Astro project
